articles.title: What's new in LiveG OS V0.2.0: multiplatform support and plenty more
articles.description: A look at a number of new features that have been added to the latest Alpha release of LiveG OS, including support for the Raspberry Pi and PinePhone.
articles.author: james

articles.title: Quoi de neuf dans LiveG OS V0.2.0 : prise en charge multiplateforme et bien plus encore
articles.description: Un aperçu d'un certain nombre de nouvelles fonctionnalités qui ont été ajoutées à la dernière version Alpha de LiveG OS, y compris la prise en charge du Raspberry Pi et du PinePhone.
articles.author: james

articles.title: Project Prism: architecture overview
articles.description: Earlier this week, our CEO James wrote about our ambitious plans to build a truly open smartphone.
articles.author: tramcrazy

articles.title: Project Prism: on the road to building an open smartphone
articles.description: That's right ⁠— we're on an ambitious plan to build an open smartphone that puts Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) at the core of our ecosystem.
articles.author: james
